SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM ( SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CAMPING_BOARD_LIST WHERE 1=1
) CAMPING_BOARD_LIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , REGDATE FROM CAMPING_BOARD_LIST WHERE BNO = #{bno}

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM CAMPING_BOARD_LIST WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
